io.netty.handler.codec.marshalling

类 CompatibleMarshallingEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToByteEncoder<Object>
          • io.netty.handler.codec.marshalling.CompatibleMarshallingEncoder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public class CompatibleMarshallingEncoder
extends MessageToByteEncoder<Object>
    MessageToByteEncoder implementation which uses JBoss Marshalling to marshal an Object. See JBoss Marshalling website for more information Use MarshallingEncoder if possible.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • encode

        protected void encode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                      Object msg,
                      ByteBuf out)
               throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: MessageToByteEncoder
        Encode a message into a ByteBuf. This method will be called for each written message that can be handled by this encoder.
        指定者:
        encode 在类中 MessageToByteEncoder<Object>
        参数:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext which this MessageToByteEncoder belongs to
        msg - the message to encode
        out - the ByteBuf into which the encoded message will be written
        抛出:
        Exception - is thrown if an error occurs
